{"id":1282324241,"question_id":3450,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8Â months","timestamp":1717903096,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1282324241/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Child Who Has the Ball After K Seconds","memory":"7.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int numberOfChild(int n, int k) { //Return the number of the child who receives the ball after k seconds.\n    //n-1 seconds front left to right.\n\n    //2 <= n <= 50\n        int rounds = k/(n-1); // 5/2 = 2   6/4 =1\n        int left = k % (n-1); //1          2\n\n        int ans = 0;\n        if (rounds % 2 == 0 ) { //even: left to right: \n            ans = left;\n        } else { //right to left. \n            ans = (n-1)-left;\n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-child-who-has-the-ball-after-k-seconds","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
